app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Video Maker With Music
app_description: This app helps you to create beautiful video from photos with different types of transitions video output mode background and many more and edit your video like trim add music and add overlays to videos. Video Maker With Music also provide different music tracks and also you can pick music from iTune library get music from video and record voice for your video and also advance trimming function and latest overlay collections. App Features: 30 awesome photo transition effects for photo slideshow and photo with music Latest collection of background images and colour for photo transition and photo with music Support different type of video output modes like square portrait landscape aspect fit and aspect fill Easy to set photo transition time duration with slider and sort photos again after selection Add music from different sources like iTune library music from video and record voice and from over latest collect short music tracks Advance trimming function with frame selection 500 latest and trending collection of video filters fx effects frames and stickers to make video more beautiful Easy to add text over video with different font style and colour Save video in custom album and share video directly from app Usage of App: Choose photos from camera or gallery Choose video from camera or gallery Apply photo transition effects glow effects and overlays for music photo Apply photo transition effects and speed for photo slideshow Set output mode for video like portrait landscape or square Add music to selected part of video and Trim Cut unwanted part of video Apply filter fx effect frame and sticker overlays Add text overlay with different font style and colour Export video and save in custom album Share your video in social media directly from app Now make professional look like videos from your photos and memories with different type of editing tools and overlay collection with Video Maker With Music!! Video Maker With Music Premium Subscription With Video Maker With Music Premium subscription you have access to all paid features and editing materials including stickers filter fx effects frames and music packages etc. Watermark and advertisements will be removed automatically. Video Maker With Music Premium subscription is billed weekly monthly or annually at the rate corresponding to the selected plan. In addition a one time payment will be offered if needed which is not one of the subscription plan. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s account settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
